summary: This function prints a value to standard-output followed by a newline.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0Atuple Planet (name : String, type : String);%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val planet1 = new Planet(%22Venus%22, %22Terrestrial%22);%0A    val planet2 = new Planet(%22Earth%22, %22Terrestrial%22);%0A    val planet3 = new Planet(%22Saturn%22, %22Jovian%22);%0A    val planet4 = new Planet(%22Uranus%22, %22Jovian%22);%0A%0A    My::describe(planet1);%0A    My::describe(planet2);%0A    My::describe(planet3);%0A    My::describe(planet4);%0A}%0A%0Adefun describe (p : Planet) : void%0A{%0A    F::println(p.name());%0A    F::print(%22  Name: %22);%0A    F::println(p.name());%0A    F::print(%22  Type: %22);%0A    F::println(p.type());%0A    F::println();%0A}
